alert.note: Alert for Blount; Jefferson; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 12:24AM CST until December 10 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN BLOUNT...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND WESTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 1223 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dallas to near Alton to Lake Purdy, moving northeast at 50 mph. Several reports of trees down in the Hoover and Vestavia Hills area. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Mountain Brook, Trussville, Pell City, Irondale, Leeds, Moody, Springville, Odenville, Center Point, Clay, Pinson, Margaret, Argo, County Line, Chalkville, Shops of Grand River, Bald Rock, and Grayson Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
